title: Inside Neeva, the Ad-Free, Privacy-First Search Engine From ex-Googlers - Slashdot
description: Sridhar Ramaswamy and Vivek Raghunathan helped turn Google into an ad giant. Now they're starting over with a service whose only customers are its users. From a report: A new search engine? One that people have to pay to use? At first blush, it may seem like a textbook example of a startup idea dest...
